title: Modern genetic sequencing tools give clearer picture of how corals are related

title_detail.value: Modern genetic sequencing tools give clearer picture of how corals are related

summary: As corals face threats from ocean warming, a new study uses the latest genetic-sequencing tools to help unravel the relationships between three similar-looking corals.

summary_detail.value: As corals face threats from ocean warming, a new study uses the latest genetic-sequencing tools to help unravel the relationships between three similar-looking corals.
